text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah! Let's get steppin', you<n>two! We're off to that
Uma Lord's<n>castle!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but where is it? How're we<n>gonna get there if we
don't know the<n>way?

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. Well, let me provide you with a<n>vague and mysterious
clue.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No! Gimme a straight answer! I've<n>had enough of the
riddles!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I know something that may come in<n>handy.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Umamusume Skill—Pace Up!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
A summary is in store! Somehow or<n>another, our party of
heroes manage<n>to pinpoint the location of the Uma<n>Lord's
castle.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
They advance! And they arrive! There<n>at the castle, they will
finally face off<n>against the menacing Uma Lord!<n>Summary
finished!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whoa, that Pace Up skill was super<n>effective!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Huhhh?! You're here already? I<n>didn't even have time to
put on my<n>cape!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
What happened to that Super Golshi<n>Ogre EX that I cunningly
positioned in<n>your path?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Didn't see it. We took a shortcut.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You must have had your fill of fun by<n>now, Golshi. It's time
to stop the<n>games.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
With this bolt of lightning, you will be<n>sent back to our home
world!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Huh, what's that crazy holy aura?<n>Did you evolve into an
Uma Angel or<n>something?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Divine judgment, come down and<n>cleanse this world!
Angelic Bolt!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ooohhh! There it is, the ultimate spell<n>to conquer the Uma
Lord! Time for the<n>credits to roll!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah? So much for bein' a cleric!<n>A little tickle like that
couldn't fix a<n>cramp, let alone the game!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: What the?! It had no effect?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I knew it...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Grass! Qué pasó? Why didn't your<n>spell work? Was the
legend wrong?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I had a feeling this might happen.<n>Something about the
phrasing has<n>been eating at me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"With innate, thunderous power, she<n>will deliver unto the
demon lord a<n>strike of destruction and felicity alike."<n>It
calls the power "innate", right? And it<n>supposedly brings
both destruction<n>and felicity.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Magic power isn't something innate<n>to Umamusume. If we
were meant to<n>defeat the Uma Lord, perhaps it<n>wouldn't
be through a spell.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm not followin' you too well, but...<n>what's clear is
defeatin' her won't<n>be as simple as we thought.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
In which case, let's give this fantasy<n>story a classic fantasy
endin'!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Oh? What kind? A battle between our<n>pet summons? A
cook-off with the<n>random ingredients clogging our<n>
inventories?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Nah, it's not a real RPG without some<n>fist-on-fist action!
Bring it on, Uma<n>Lord! Try wrestling your way through<n>a
sixty-minute singles match with<n>yours truly!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Oh! So that's how it is? Two can play<n>at that game! Forget
wrestling—it's not<n>a JRPG without a collectible card<n>
minigame!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Take thaaaat!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Aaagh, I'm done for! That limited<n>edition Mil Masterio
slammer got me<n>good!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Another win for Team Golshi! I knew<n>my first edition
Umandam cards<n>wouldn't let me down! People slept<n>on
them after the show was canceled,<n>but they're super
strong!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El! Are you really going to waste our<n>time playing that silly
game?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I mean, I had to give it a go! Itlooked so much fun...

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Well, if cards aren't cutting it for you,<n>let's settle this like
true Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
What better contest is there than a<n>race? With my Uma Lord
powers,<n>conjuring up a course will be an<n>easy-peasy
piece of cupcake!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Welcome to Toky—I mean...<n>Demonkyo Racecourse!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ooooh! Just like that and we're<n>practically at the real Tokyo<n>
Racecourse!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
All right, El, Grass! Bet you can't<n>complain if we settle this
fair and<n>mostly square on the fantasy track!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Just wait until you see my demon<n>dash!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oooh, now that's what I'mtalkin' about! Brawler's physically thestrongest class in Uma Quest. I can'tlose!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, all right. But please, El, don't let<n>your guard down.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Qué? What's wrong, Grass? The look<n>on your face is
freakin' me out.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: You heard what Golshi said just now.She's going to fight "fair andmostly square".

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
This isn't the real Tokyo. We're still<n>in Umanest, a virtual
kingdom of<n>swords and spells.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
We're about to run in a fantasy<n>race—where blades will
clash and<n>spells will soar!
